TopicTitle: The effect on people from major events

Articles.Content:
I was at my Grandpa's today, and I was drawing a picture with the Mun and Kerbin, and a small Kethane Rover on the Mun. Grandpa took a look, and he took it (he asked) and started to draw a whole setup, astronauts, the modules, everything, and it told me how a effect like a moon landing can really effect the people in a very positive way. It made me feel great inside.

Thoughts?
